title: Mwansa the Great
creator_credit: Rungano Nyoni, Gabriel Gauchet, ICreateFilms and UK Film Council
brief_description: A little boy sees himself as ‘Mwansa the great’, a full-grown warrior hunting lions. His little sister also visualises herself as an adult, ‘Princess Shula’ who is responsible for disciplining and looking after Mwansa.
creator_credit_for_label: Rungano Nyoni, Gabriel Gauchet, ICreateFilms and UK Film Council
